channel.title: CVE Feed for Michael Simpson -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Michael Simpson -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-46072|2023-10-26T11:39:32.042Z -- michael%20simpson -- add%20shortcodes%20actions%20and%20filters
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Michael Simpson Add Shortcodes Actions And Filters plugin <= 2.0.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-44475|2023-10-10T14:25:19.501Z -- michael%20simpson -- add%20shortcodes%20actions%20and%20filters
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Michael Simpson Add Shortcodes Actions And Filters plugin <= 2.0.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-30558|2024-06-04T17:38:49.610Z -- michael%20simpson -- add%20shortcodes%20actions%20and%20filters
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Michael Simpson Add Shortcodes Actions And Filters allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Add Shortcodes Actions And Filters: from n/a through 2.10.
